rooms.name: Entrance Lobby
rooms.description: A welcoming foyer with natural light from overhead skylights and a minimalist Bohemian design.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: An open and airy space with comfortable seating arrangements, Bohemian decor, and a wall of vintage art.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A functional and inviting kitchen space with an island counter and integrated storage, designed to optimize workflow while respecting local building norms.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: A small utility room for laundry and storage designed to ensure smooth workflow.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A comfortable guest bedroom with Bohemian decor and ample natural light to create a relaxed environment.

openings.name: Front Door
openings.description: A decorative wooden door with glass inserts to allow natural light into the foyer.

openings.name: Balcony Access Door
openings.description: Provides access to the rooftop terrace from one of the living spaces.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: The master bedroom features a serene ambiance with Bohemian accents and ample closet space.

rooms.name: Second Bedroom
rooms.description: A cozy bedroom with Bohemian decor and a personal study nook.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A modern yet functional bathroom incorporating local materials and efficient water usage.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: A compact bathroom adjacent to the guest bedroom for convenience.

rooms.name: Study/Workspace
rooms.description: A designated space for work or hobbies with ample natural light and a Bohemian flair.

rooms.description: A playful and safe space designed for children with Bohemian touches and vibrant colors.

rooms.name: Storage/Utility Loft

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace
rooms.description: A spacious outdoor terrace with a view of the surroundings, incorporating local stone paving and seating areas.

furnishing.description: A small fountain to promote positive energy flow in line with Vastu principles.

openings.name: Staircase Access

openings.name: Rooftop Balcony Door
